docs.snippet: The top American commander in Iraq believes U.S.-backed forces will recapture Islamic State's two major strongholds - the cities of Raqqa in Syria and Mosul in Iraq - within the next six months, his spokesman said on Wednesday....

docs.snippet: Spain's Caixabank successfully completed the takeover of Portugal's second-largest listed lender, Banco BPI, paying 645 million euros (550.18 million pounds) to raise its stake to 84.5 percent from 45 percent, Euronext Lisbon said in a statement o...
docs.lead_paragraph: Spain's Caixabank successfully completed the takeover of Portugal's second-largest listed lender, Banco BPI, paying 645 million euros (550.18 million pounds) to raise its stake to 84.5 percent from 45 percent, Euronext Lisbon said in a statement on Wednesday.

headline.main: Caixabank Gets 84.5 Percent Stake in Portugal's Banco BPI in Takeover
headline.print_headline: Caixabank Gets 84.5 Percent Stake in Portugal's Banco BPI in Takeover
